i, but i think that in the first video the security guard was some idiot who couldn’t win a verbal argument with some punk, so he got angry.

Thats where I responded

item.title: Asshole Cops
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

On another topic

i haven’t watched all the videos, nor will i, but i think that in the first video the security guard was some idiot who couldn’t win a verbal argument with some punk, so he got angry. that shouldn’t happen with a good cop, so don’t make your dumbass opinions about the police or security guards based on these videos. the kids talked back when they shouldn’t have for the mere purpose of starting shit. they also swore in public, which is disorderly conduct (disturbance of the peace), which, in most states, is a misdemeanor.

Ever seen these skateboarder kids in public?

Each time I see one they either piss me off to the point I’m attacking them with a bat or they’ve got somebody so pissed of they’ve called the cops.

Read full topic

item.title: Asshole Cops
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:22, topic:120643”][quote author=Tr3v0r link=topic=170213.msg1578482#msg1578482 date=1183883200]

I hate skaters. Fuck. If I seen that fight. I’d run up, pants the skater, slap him on the ass and run away. Wait…

Your gay.

It’s not gay. It’s smart. How is your victim going to chase you with pants around his ankles? And why not slap him on his bare ass? You already pants’ed’ him.

Think you may be gay.
[/quote]
Know you are gay.[/quote]

Umm watever?

I hate them also, hate, hate, but sometime you need them.[/quote]

The police started off as a gang, the police is nothing but a gang, that has support from the goverment and all that.

If we didnt have police, other gangs would form to protect it, in some parts of america they have their own gangs to protect like their street and things like that.

I’m a skater. But in my city there’s not alot of “nice” building with stairs so we don’t get in much trouble. But onetime I was skating and a grocery store just like the curbs while my friend was getting a drink. And the cops got called on us. And he made us give him alll of our “info” and called our parents but my parents didn’t care.[/quote]
I r stack once and dis fat guy in a tux came out and was like “Get to da skatepark niga” He looked like a Penguin.
